name: Mirror's Story
description:
The Mirror's Story is about one little boy  who was not allowed to live in peace. And now you must help him to stay alive. 
This game is made for Weekly Game Jam №148. Theme - Mirror.

At first i wanted to make something with mirror mechanic, but then I decided to do something more crazy, and thats what happened :)
I am going to modify this game after some time. It is currently pre-pre-pre-pre-pre alpha 0.1. There might be tons of bugs (I hope not).

I used some sound effects from:

- freesound.org

- Rayn

-White Bat Audio

-E's Jammy Jams

I think you enjoyed this game.
